body: BarCamp Nigeria 2011: "The Barcamp Nigeria team is proud to announce the schedule for 2011 Barcamp events. The event was successfully organized two editions in 2009 and 2010, and having listened to the yearnings of tech professionals for engaging events, we are poised to take it further in 2011..."

title: Nigeria: BarCamp Nigeria 2011

sentence: BarCamp Nigeria 2011: "The Barcamp Nigeria team is proud to announce the schedule for 2011 Barcamp events.
The event was successfully organized two editions in 2009 and 2010, and having listened to the yearnings of tech professionals for engaging events, we are poised to take it further in 2011..."
